name: Elayabarathi M V
headline: Frontend Web Developer
about: Welcome! I'm Elayabarathi M V, a professional biotechnologist with expertise in microbiology, genetics, and bioinformatics. Innovated cancer treatments via nanobiotechnology. Accomplished frontend web developer. Passionate about integrating biology and technology for innovation. Strong collaborator and problem-solver, dedicated to continuous learning and interdisciplinary success.

wetlab: Pre and Post Culturing Methods (Media Preparation, Centrifugation, Lyophilization)

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website designed to showcase my skills, projects, and professional background in a clean, modern, and responsive interface. This single-page application (SPA) serves as my digital business card. It features smooth animations, a project gallery, and a contact section, all built with React for a dynamic user experience and styled with Tailwind CSS for rapid, utility-first development.

projects.name: Bamboo Blogs
projects.description: A full-stack, minimalist blog platform that allows users to create, read, update, and delete articles. A robust web application built with the Python Flask framework on the backend. It uses PostgreSQL (or SQLite for development) for data persistence, demonstrating a solid understanding of backend development, RESTful routing, and database management with SQL.

projects.name: LinkedIn Profile Clone
projects.description: A functional front-end clone of the LinkedIn user profile page, replicating its layout and core UI components. This project showcases my ability to reverse-engineer and recreate complex, professional user interfaces. Built with React and Tailwind CSS, it accurately mimics the structure, styling, and responsive behavior of a real LinkedIn profile.

projects.name: Budget Map
projects.description: An AI-assisted financial visualization tool that helps users map and track their budget using interactive charts and graphs. A modern web app built with Next.js and React, focusing on data visualization for personal finance. The 'AI Made' aspect highlights the use of AI in its conceptualization or development, providing an intuitive way to understand income and expenses.

projects.name: Spotify Clone
projects.description: A feature-rich clone of the Spotify music streaming application's user interface. This project replicates the core look and feel of Spotify, including a music player interface and library view. It integrates Clerk for user authentication, demonstrating how to handle user sessions in a front-end application. You will also find a surprice feature if you login!!

projects.name: eCommerce website
projects.description: A complete full-stack eCommerce platform with product listings, a shopping cart, and integrated payments. A comprehensive project showcasing full-stack JavaScript development. It includes product management, user cart functionality, and integrates the Stripe API to handle secure payment processing, simulating a real-world online store.

projects.name: Stellar AI Chatbot
projects.description: An interactive web-based chatbot powered by the Gemini AI, providing intelligent and dynamic conversations. This application bridges the gap between a modern React front-end and a powerful large language model (Gemini AI). It features a sleek chat interface where users can ask questions and receive AI-generated responses in real-time.

projects.name: ToDo App
projects.description: A classic task management application for creating, updating, and deleting to-do items. A fundamental CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application built with React. It demonstrates core front-end development concepts like state management, handling user input, and persisting data locally.

projects.name: Shopping List
projects.description: A simple and intuitive front-end application for managing a shopping list. A vanilla JavaScript project that focuses on DOM manipulation and event handling. It allows users to add, remove, and check off items, showcasing pure JavaScript skills without relying on external frameworks.

projects.name: Profile Card
projects.description: A clean and visually appealing UI component to display user profile information. A front-end focused project that highlights skills in HTML and CSS to create a responsive and aesthetically pleasing profile card, a common element in social media and dashboards.

projects.name: Speed Snitch Bot
projects.description: A Python automation bot that monitors internet speed and automatically files complaints on Twitter if the speed falls below a defined threshold. This project uses Selenium for browser automation to interact with Twitter. It combines web scraping, automated testing tools for real-world tasks, and API integration (for speed testing) to create a practical utility for monitoring service quality.

projects.name: Tune Back
projects.description: A 'Musical Time Machine' that creates Spotify playlists based on the Billboard Hot 100 charts from a specific date in the past. This script uses web scraping (BeautifulSoup) to extract song data from Billboard's archives. It then interacts with the Spotify API to automatically search for these songs and generate a nostalgic playlist, showcasing skills in API integration and data parsing.

projects.name: Brey Bytes API
projects.description: A RESTful API backend for a cafe directory, providing data about various cafes with their amenities like WiFi and power outlets. A backend-focused project built with Flask and SQLite. It implements all fundamental REST API methods (GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE) and was tested using Postman, demonstrating a strong understanding of server-side logic and API design.

projects.name: Snake Game
projects.description: A classic arcade-style Snake game built using Python. This project utilizes the Python Turtle graphics library to handle game rendering and user input. It demonstrates understanding of game loops, collision detection, and score tracking in a simple, fun package.

projects.name: Pong Game
projects.description: A recreation of the legendary Pong arcade game for two players. Another project using the Python Turtle library, this game focuses on object movement, paddle control, and scoring mechanics. It's a testament to the fundamentals of video game programming.

projects.name: CRUD App
projects.description: A fundamental web application that demonstrates the core principles of data management by allowing users to Create, Read, Update, and Delete records. This project is a classic exercise in full-stack functionality, built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It focuses on the essential operations of persistent data storage and manipulation, providing a clean interface for users to interact with a dataset. It serves as an excellent foundation for understanding how data-driven applications work before moving to more complex frameworks and databases.

projects.name: AI Portfolio
projects.description: An experimental, futuristic portfolio website with 3D elements, conceptualized and built with AI assistance. This project explores the cutting edge of web design by incorporating 3D visuals and AI-driven development. It demonstrates a willingness to experiment with new technologies to create immersive and unique user experiences.

projects.name: Iron vs Cancer
projects.description: A research project investigating the synthesis and application of iron oxide nanoparticles (FeNPs) for targeted anticancer therapies. This project involved the synthesis and encapsulation of iron oxide nanoparticles to evaluate their efficacy and specificity in destroying cancer cells. It represents hands-on experience in nanobiotechnology, material characterization, and in-vitro biological testing.

projects.name: Silver vs Bacteria
projects.description: A published research study on the green synthesis of silver nanoparticles (AgNPs) and their potent antimicrobial properties against various pathogenic bacteria. This work focused on an eco-friendly synthesis method for silver nanoparticles and their characterization. The research successfully demonstrated significant antimicrobial activity, contributing to the field of alternative treatments for microbial infections. The published paper is a testament to the scientific rigor and successful outcomes of the project.

experience.details: Plan the direction and future for IT in accordance to the business continuity plan.

Built real-world projects like a CRUD user management app and an eCommerce site while learning both front-end and back-end development. Gained practical experience in coding best practices, debugging, and problem-solving.

Gained hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js, APIs, and more. Built real-world projects like a shopping list app and user management system, strengthening technical and analytical skills.

experience.position: Applied Microbiology abd Agricultural Biotechnology Intern
experience.details: Gained practical skills in microbial characterization, biofertilizer production, mushroom tissue culture, and Black Soldier Fly Larvae rearing. Built a strong foundation in applied microbiology and agricultural biotechnology.
Operated advanced machinery and contributed to eco-friendly packaging solutions. Gained valuable experience in sustainable agriculture and food processing, applying theory to real-world practice

education.institution: K. S. Rangasamy College of Technology (Autonomous)
education.description: Gaining a strong foundation in core principles and practical lab skills. Beyond academics, active participation in extracurricular and cultural events helped me develop leadership and interpersonal abilities. This experience nurtured my passion for continuous learning and innovation in biotechnology.

education.education: Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) - Biology-Mathematics - State Board
education.institution: U. R. Palaniammal Matric Higher Secondary School
education.description: I built a strong academic foundation while growing both personally and socially. Guided by dedicated teachers, I developed critical thinking and a disciplined approach to learning. Involvement in sports, clubs, and cultural events helped strengthen my leadership and teamwork skills.

education.education: Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) - State Board
education.institution: U. R. Palaniammal Matric Higher Secondary School
education.description: Throughout my school years, I built a strong foundation in my studies. With the help of my teachers, I learned to study with discipline and think carefully.
